meanings.definition: Intensify or increase in quality or value.
meanings.sent1: Using a magnifying glass can enhance your ability to see small details.
meanings.sent2: Adding fresh flowers can enhance the beauty of the room.
meanings.sent3: Trying to enhance a painting by adding glitter may not always work.
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to enhance the brightness of the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The new lighting system will greatly enhance the overall ambiance of the restaurant.

meanings.definition: Make greater in value or beauty.
meanings.sent1: A new coat of paint can enhance the value of a house.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry was designed to enhance the beauty of the dress.
meanings.sent3: He tried to enhance his appearance by wearing a funny hat.
meanings.sent4: The sunset seemed to enhance the colors of the sky.
meanings.sent5: The special effects in the movie really enhance the viewing experience.

meanings.sent1: Studying regularly can enhance your understanding of the subject.
meanings.sent2: The new software update will enhance the performance of the computer.
meanings.sent3: She tried to enhance her cooking skills by watching cooking shows.
meanings.sent4: The music score can enhance the emotional impact of a movie scene.
meanings.sent5: The additional training will enhance your abilities in the workplace.
